titles.title: New Every Morning Is The Love (easy nice)

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}New ev'ry morning is the love Our wak'ning and uprising prove Thru sleep and darkness safely brought Restored to life and pow'r and thought{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}New mercies each returning day Hover around us while we pray New perils past new sins forgiv'n New thoughts of God New hopes of heav'n{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}If on our daily course our mind Be set to hallow all we find New treasures still of countless price God will provide for sacrifice{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Old friends old scenes will lovelier be As more of heav'n in each we see Some soft'ing gleam of love and prayer Shall dawn on every cross and care{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The trivial round the common task Will furnish all we ought to ask Room to deny ourselves a road To bring us daily nearer God{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Only O Lord in Thy dear love Fit us for perfect rest above And help us this and every day To live more nearly as we pray{/lang-eng}
